content: in this pattern you can find the full instructions to how to make a strawberry picnic bag this is a classic 13-square crochet tote bag with a strawberry motif linked in the pattern you can also find a video tutorial link to my youtube for a visual guide and tutorial it can also be found here crochet the cutest strawberry tote bag with me 1 you may sell your finished makes but please credit shaiyeh instagram/youtube/ravelry properly as the designer the pattern is also available for download through my ko-fi if you wish to leave a tip - 1 https //www youtube com/playlist list=plor2poo4sd4dr5ir--l6_gai9hfnzaxcn
